product_name: The North Face Pre-Hab Daypack - 2012 Closeout
long_description: A spacious rucksack for urban outings, The North Face Pre-Hab pack features top loading for stashing of gear or groceries and front straps to secure your longboard. FlexVent(TM) shoulder straps and back panel were designed in partnership with the American Chiropractic Association to offer a new standard in load-carrying comfort. Injection-molded shoulder straps create flex zones to alleviate clavicle hot spots, pressure points and neck strain. Comfortable air-mesh back panel features an improved fit with a recessed channel that helps take pressure off your spine; sternum strap keeps pack close. Main compartment features a cinch closure to keep items secure; laptop pocket can be accessed from the top or the side and fits laptops up to 15 in. Zippered tricot-lined pocket on the top flap is perfect for eyewear. Dual straps on front let you secure a skateboard or stash a jacket. Closeout.
short_description: A spacious rucksack for urban outings, The North Face Pre-Hab pack features top loading for stashing of gear or groceries and front straps to secure your longboard.
